name: .XSOSD File Extension
summary: Learn about .XSOSD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an XSOSD file in ProgDVB (Windows) and use it as a ProgDVB skin. To do so:
Place the file in ProgDVB's Skins folder.
In ProgDVB, select Settings → Options → User Interface.
From the Skin dropdown menu, select your XSOSD file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
